"Describe the issues you've encountered here. If you're giving suggestions, we'd appreciate more details!"

"Looks like you've changed SIM cards. Sign in to your Mi Account to reactivate Xiaomi Cloud."

"If you turn off Find device, you won't be able to locate your phone using this feature. If your phone supports NFC functionality, all your bank cards and keycards will be deleted from Mi Pay."

"Sign in to i.mi.com to locate, lock, or erase your device. This might help you to find your device in case it's lost."

An outgoing SMS message may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for this message. When you switch your SIM card, a message may be sent automatically to reactivate this feature.

"Mi Message lets you send messages to other MIUI devices without incurring charges when connected to Wi-Fi.
You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Settings."

"This feature may require your phone number. An outgoing SMS message may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
This feature encrypts and sends your device's ID to Mi's servers."

"This feature may require your phone number. 2 outgoing SMS messages may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for these messages.
This feature encrypts and sends your device's ID to Mi's servers."

"This feature may require your phone number. When SIM card is detected, an outgoing SMS message may be required to activate this service. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
This feature encrypts and sends your device's ID to Mi's servers."
"Call other MIUI devices for free using your internet connection. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Settings. VoIP is supported by Weihui. View Weihui's Privacy Policy"
"Only sync contacts' profile pictures when you're connected to a Wi-Fi network"
Only use Wi-Fi to sync photos
"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost."
"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost."

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, Wi-Fi settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices.

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, Wi-Fi settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices. Access the things you sync from any browser at i.mi.com.

An outgoing SMS message may be required to activate these services. Your carrier will charge you for this message. When you switch your SIM card, a message may be sent automatically to reactivate these services.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Calendar:
For syncing events
• Accessing SMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing MMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Editing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Storage:
For saving items on your device (e.g. images, videos, songs)
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Xiaomi Cloud.
"

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. You can go to i.mi.com to locate, lock, or reset it.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, this service needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Accessing device info:
For identifying your device
• Location:
For locating your device and switching to the lost mode
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Find device.
"
